DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy FTY720 versus mycophenolate mofetil ( MMF , Roche brand ) combine cyclosporine corticosteroid patient receive kidney transplant .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety FTY720 Versus Mycophenolate Mofetil ( MMF , Roche Brand ) de Novo Adult Renal Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Completion core study Exclusion Criteria Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
